summary: This code imports the necessary modules, defines an audio file path, retrieves its duration using getAudioDuration function and prints the floating point duration.

details.comment: This code imports the necessary modules, defines an audio file path, retrieves its duration using getAudioDuration function and prints the floating point duration.
details.content:
import test
from pyjom.audiotoolbox import getAudioDuration
audioPath = "/root/Desktop/works/pyjom/tests/music_analysis/exciting_bgm.mp3"
audioDuration = getAudioDuration(audioPath)
print("audioDuration:", audioDuration)
# audioDuration: 302.915918367
# obviously floating point duration.
